connector.description:
Send messages to Google Pubsub.

The serviceAccountKey property needs to be encoded in base64, so when you pass it as parameter, don't forget to encode it.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.project.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.projectId
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.project.description: The Google Cloud PubSub Project Id

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.service.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.service.description: The Service account key that can be used as credentials for the PubSub publisher/subscriber
